translations: v.订做，改制（以满足顾主的需要）（customise 的现在分词，customise 等于 customize）

sentences.sentence: He began by customising his new artificial limbs so that they were optimised for climbing.
sentences.translation: 他开始定做自己的新人造假腿，以便它们能够最利于登山。

sentences.sentence: Customising your preferences will save you time by remembering your most frequently used shipping options.
sentences.translation: 定制您的首选项将通过记住您最常用的运输选项而节省您的时间。

sentences.sentence: The winner serves the advertisement, often customising it—so you may see more ads for convertible cars on a sunny day.
sentences.translation: 竞价的胜出者提供的通常是定制广告，这也是为什么在晴朗的日子里你可能看到更多的敞篷车广告。
